title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: This RFC outlines the comprehensive requirements for the CodeQualityGameshow platform. The scope includes gamification aspects (points system, levels, achievements), code quality rules (coding standards, best practices, common mistakes to avoid), user roles (contestants, mentors, judges), scoring system, leaderboard, challenge creation and submission process, code editor integration (support for popular IDEs such as Visual Studio Code, Atom, and Sublime Text), user authentication and authorization (OAuth 2.0 integration for social logins and Google/GitHub API for account linking), data storage and retrieval (SQL and NoSQL solutions), APIs for third-party tools integration (Linting tools, Testing frameworks), localization and accessibility features (i18n support, WCAG 2.1 compliance), performance metrics (response times, load times, error rates), a community feedback and suggestion mechanism, and other essential components. The platform's performance metrics should be specified to ensure optimal user experience. This RFC is currently in the READY_FOR_TASK_DECOMPOSITION state.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and any other necessary components. Define the technology stack and integration points.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the CodeQualityGameshow platform, including the gameshow-like format, code editor, leaderboard, and other UI components.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop the backend services for the CodeQualityGameshow platform, including the code quality analysis engine, game logic, scoring system, and any other necessary services.

title: Implement Frontend Application
description: Develop the frontend application for the CodeQualityGameshow platform, implementing the user interface and integrating with the backend services.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for the CodeQualityGameshow platform, including user data, game data, and any other necessary data.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures for the CodeQualityGameshow platform, including user authentication, data encryption, and protection against common web application vulnerabilities.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the CodeQualityGameshow platform, including automated testing, build, and deployment processes.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance plan for the CodeQualityGameshow platform, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Write comprehensive documentation and user guides for the CodeQualityGameshow platform, including installation instructions, user manuals, and developer documentation.
